propsDescription.activeIcon: Icon to display when the accordion item is active.
propsDescription.canSelfCollapse: Allows the active item to collapse when clicked again.
propsDescription.children: The accordion items to display. Each child must provide a title and content.
propsDescription.className: Additional CSS classes to apply to the accordion wrapper.
propsDescription.defaultActiveIndex: The initially active accordion item index.
propsDescription.direction: Defines the orientation of the accordion, either vertical or horizontal.
propsDescription.inactiveIcon: Icon to display when the accordion item is inactive.

slotDescription.default: Slot for title, icon and content

accordion.subtitle: The accordion component is a collapsible content display element that allows users to expand or collapse sections with optional icons, orientations, and self-collapse behavior.
accordion.title: Accordéon

badge.subtitle: Badge component is a compact UI element used to display short, contextual information such as status, labels, or icons, with severity and styling support.
badge.title: Badge

button.subtitle: The Button component is a flexible and customizable button implementation for Vue applications. It supports various properties for styling, behavior, and functionality, making it suitable for different use cases.
button.title: Button

card.footerContent: The standard Lorem Ipsum passage, used since the 1500s
card.subtitle: A versatile container for displaying content in a structured format. It supports slots for custom header, footer, and body content, making it adaptable for various use cases.
card.title: Card

bodyContent.confirm: Are you sure you want to proceed? (fr)
bodyContent.confirmDelete: Are you sure to delete user? (fr)

eventDescription.close: Emitted when the modal is closed. (fr)
eventDescription.confirm: Emitted when the confirm button is clicked. (fr)

propsDescription.closable: If true, shows close button on top right of the modal. (fr)
propsDescription.dismissOnClickOut: Closes the modal when clicking outside the modal content. (fr)
propsDescription.icon: Override the icon before modal message content. (fr)

confirmationModal.subtitle: A modal dialog used to prompt users for confirmation before proceeding with an action. Supports customization of header, message, and footer content via props and slots.
confirmationModal.title: Confirmation modal

data.subtitle: The Data component is a reusable Vue component designed to display a labeled value.
data.title: Data

divider.subtitle: Divider component is a visual separator used to group or divide content with the border line either horizontally or vertically.
divider.title: Divider

dropdown.subtitle: The Dropdown component provides an accessible and customizable menu for selecting actions or options. It supports labels, icons, slots for custom triggers and icons, and emits events on selection.
dropdown.title: Dropdown

fileCard.subtitle: The FileCard component is a structured card layout that displays file detail with a thumbnail and action buttons.
fileCard.title: File card

filesList.subtitle: The FilesList component displays a collection of files in a list layout using FileCard component, with customizable actions and visibility options.
filesList.title: Files List

gridContainer.subtitle: GridContainer component is a responsive layout wrapper that arranges its child elements in a flexible grid structure.
gridContainer.title: Grid container

loading.subtitle: LoadingPage component is a full-screen overlay loader used to indicate a loading state across the entire page.
loading.title: Loading page

contents.content1: Season Sale: Enjoy massive discounts with up to 50% off on a wide range of selected items — from fashion to electronics, don’t miss out on these limited-time offers!
contents.content2: New features just launched! Check them out!
contents.content3: New Year, New You: Start fresh with our services!
contents.content4: We value your feedback: take our quick survey!
contents.content5: Warning: Limited time only! Sale ends soon!
contents.danger: Invalid credentials. Please check your email or password and try again.
contents.info: Your profile has been updated. Changes may take a few minutes to appear across all devices.
contents.success: Payment received! Your order is now being processed and you’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.
contents.tip: Use a password with at least 8 characters to make your password stronger.
contents.warning: Your session is about to expire in 2 minutes. Save your work to avoid losing changes.

eventDescription.close: Emitted when the close icon is clicked.

propsDescription.enableClose: Displays a close icon if true, allowing the message to be dismissed.
propsDescription.icon: Icon to display alongside the message.
propsDescription.message: The message text, or an array of message texts to displayed in the component.
propsDescription.severity: Defines the message background color style.
propsDescription.showIcon: Displays a icon before message if true.

slotDescription.default: Slot for message. Overrides the message content.
slotDescription.icon: Slot for custom icon. Overrides the `icon` prop if provided.

message.subtitle: The Message component displays contextual messages with optional icons and a closable action. It supports custom slots, making it flexible for various use cases.
message.title: Message

modal.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. eventDescription.close: Emitted when the modal is requested to close (via close icon or outside click).

propsDescription.dismissOnClickOut: Closes the modal when clicking outside the modal content.
propsDescription.show: Controls the visibility of the modal.
propsDescription.size: Defines the width of the modal.
propsDescription.title: Title for the modal. Override by `header` slot if provided.

slotDescription.default: Main content of the modal body.
slotDescription.footer: Footer section of the modal. Placed below the content.
slotDescription.header: Custom header content. Overrides `title` if provided.

modal.subtitle: A modal dialog component for displaying content in an overlay with support for custom headers, footers, and dismissal logic.
modal.title: Modal

eventDescription.actionClick: Emitted when toolbar action menu is clicked.

propsDescription.centered: Aligns the content in the center.
propsDescription.loading: Displays a loading overlay within the page content.
propsDescription.subTitle: The subtitle text displayed below the title.
propsDescription.title: The main title text displayed at the top of the page.
propsDescription.titleElement: HTML tag to be used for the title element.
propsDescription.titleTag: Optional label displayed next to the title, typically rendered as a badge.
propsDescription.toolbarActionMenu: Toolbar actions menu on the top-right of the page header.

slotDescription.subtitle: Custom subtitle slot. Replaces the `subTitle` prop.
slotDescription.titleTag: Custom title tag slot. Replaces the `titleTag` prop.
slotDescription.toolbar: Toolbar area on the top-right of the page header.

page.subtitle: Page component is a layout wrapper used to structure pages with a title, subtitle, toolbar, and loading overlay support.
page.title: Page

popup.subtitle: The Popup component is a versatile overlay that displays content relative to a trigger element with automatic or configurable positioning.
popup.title: Popup

sortableList.subtitle: SortableList component is a flexible list that supports drag-and-drop reordering, with support for custom item rendering.
sortableList.title: Sortable list

usage.sortSport: Sort sports from most to least favorite

eventDescription.complete: Emitted when all steps are completed
eventDescription.updateActiveIndex: Emitted when the active step index is updated

propsDescription.activeIndex: Index of the currently active step for controlled stepper.
propsDescription.direction: Direction of the stepper, either horizontal or vertical.
propsDescription.hideButtons: If true, the default stepper buttons are hidden.

slotDescription.step: Dynamic slot for step content (use step as slot name from steps prop)

stepper.subtitle: The Stepper component guides users through a multi-step process with visual progress indicators.
stepper.title: Stepper

usage.complete: Are you sure you want to complete the process?

propsDescription.enableHashRouting: Enable hash routing for the tab view URL.
propsDescription.id: Id of tab to save the state. Should provide 'id' in case of tab state persistence.
propsDescription.interceptTabChange: Enable event emitting before tab actually change.
propsDescription.interceptTabClose: Enable event emitting before tab actually change.
propsDescription.lazy: The lazy prop enables lazy loading.It only loads content for the active tab.
propsDescription.persistState: If true, tab state is saved either in localStorage or sessionStorage.
propsDescription.position: Position of the tab panel header relative to its content.

slotDescription.default: Content for the tab, matched using the key attribute on each element

tabView.subtitle: The TabView component organizes content into tabbed panels with support for multiple positions, closable tabs, state persistence, and interception handlers for tab changes and closures
tabView.title: Tab view

disableTabState.subtitle: By default, tab state is persisted between page refresh and navigations. You can disable this feature by passing :persist-state='false' prop to the component
disableTabState.title: State persistence disabled

tabbed-panel.depreciation-message: {'@'}deprecated: Use TabView component from the ui package instead
tabbed-panel.no-title: Les descendants sans prop `title` seront ignorés
tabbed-panel.title: Tabbed Panel

tooltip.subtitle: The Tooltip component provides contextual information when hovering over an element. It supports various positions, custom styles, and can be triggered by hover or click events.
tooltip.title: Tooltip

youtubeFacade.subtitle: YoutubeFacade component is a lightweight preview for embedding YouTube videos, showing a thumbnail and loading the iframe.
youtubeFacade.title: Youtube facade
